title: When is Lunar Revel 2018 coming around?
body: I want to know since i want to buy Dragonblade Riven. {{champion:92}}

replies.body: I WANT STAR GUARDIAN URGOT FFS.
yah i am waiting for warring kingdoms azir almost a year :c
U just need to wait 8 days;o event is cominnnggg <3 {{summoner:6}}
thank you sm!
Yo same here... not for a year but still... 2 months {{champion:268}}
I want my {{champion:99}}  skin :/
Same {{champion:99}} {{sticker:sg-janna}}
the {{champion:99}}  skin is nice but imagine {{champion:163}} would get this skin and not the with over 5 AND a ULTIMATE oh and the ultimate skin is 11 skins in 1 a bit unfair
Yep!! Waiting for the {{champion:99}} skin :D
Lunar Revel comes around every Chinese New Year. This year's Chinese New Year will be on the 16th of February, so expect Lunar Revel to come around during that time next month.
Thanks! :P
So excited to get warring kingdoms {{champion:86}}
Me too, if i don't get that skin. all the rp i bought for the lunar revel skins are going away, i swear rito, release them already. ITS 8th FEB!{{champion:86}}
Just got it yesterday! Man is it badass. probably my favorite {{champion:86}} skin hands down.
So are we not getting a personalized Lunar Revel Shop?
I do not believe so. Maybe for Valentines day?

I bought the Legendary Lunar Revel Loot Bundle (22 Revel Orbs + 2 Bonus Revel Orbs, Bonus Revel Grab Bag, and 96 Revel Tokens) for 5500 RP and got 5 Revel Grab Bags from it along with a gemstone. So out of opening 24 Revel Orbs I was able to snag 4 bags. VERY HAPPY! Anyone else having good luck opening Revel Orbs? Reply under my post! : )
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
THEY ARE OUT #INSTABOUGHT[](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/388025468429008896/411195971096018954/unknown.png)
I thought that the skins were comming up at 2pm as always but 2 hours later ..... fuck my life
Ja, sie kommen heute (Wurde von einem Riot Mitarbeiter bestätigt). Ich schätze sie kommen so um 17-20 Uhr! Ich denke aber eher um 20 {{champion:99}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:75}} {{sticker:sg-lux}}
Ja man geil danke für die info

Don't forget, Riot headquaters lies in LA, so they usually use the PT timezone as measure.
The events usually start around 5 to 8 pm CET.
Lunar Revel Crafting Assets just appeared so it shouldn't be too long now
I m restarting my client since 2 hours to see when updates are comming but it just doesnt update.

So what time is in NA right now on Germany its 4pm and their till not out.
Also at Zoe's release skin where commig up at the same day i think so i m confident their comming today
I need my{{champion:19}} skin
It will all be here tomorrow :)
Are you sure? I don't want to have false hope and then be dissapointed xD
Yes, it was confirmed by Riot on Reddit that it will start sometime today (the 8th)
Oh god thank you soooooo much, you saved my day :333

We usually got the updates sometimes around 2 or 3 o’clock :/ So i guess we have to wait for around that time to see changes. But my concern is how does rito put both 2 events at the same time next week because there are too many skins will be appear in the shop (along with other valentine’s and new year skins)

Don't think it's coming out this week. Since rito put in the swain rework they probably are going to leave it out so people can buy his skins. Lunar revel should be next week but probably not this week :(.{{champion:99}}
February 8, afternoon... still nothing... i want my {{champion:99}} skin :C
yup thats so bullshit lunar revel started today but riot thinks "no u dont get ur godlike skins muhahhahahahaah" i want my{{champion:268}} >:c
I want this Riven skin but my Acc got permabanned and now i still want it even on my new Acc i m hyping so hard but they arent out yet.
I want my {{champion:86}} skin soooo much
samee
Lunar Revel event would start at February 8.. ^.^ {{champion:99}}

how do u find when it starts
I mean i just want to make sure because I would be really dissapointed if it didnt
man i really want those skins
I want the kat chroma {{sticker:katarina-love}}
Valentines and Lunar Revel at the same time, hot diggity dog.
im waitin for the warring kingdoms garen. its too lit
I Hope Lunar Reveal 2018 comes around early {{summoner:-1}} , I need that {{champion:92}} skin
I have been looking for lunar revel date everywhere, thanks a lot guys{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Generally, in League it begins whenever they feel like it XD  Most of the past few years it's been at the end of January to the start of February.  So it would be somewhere between patches 8.2 - 8.4 I'd say.
Thank you!

Looks like it will be within the next patch I believe as they have posted a teaser! :D
